metadata.title: CVE-2017-0558 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in Mediaserver could enable a localmalicious application to access data outside of its permission levels. Thisissue is rated as Moderate because it could be used to access data withoutpermission. Product: Android. Versions: 4.4.4, 5.0.2, 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1,7.0, 7.1.1. Android ID: A-34056274.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
